spec_data.Name: zypper-aptitude
spec_data.Description:
This package provides apt-get and aptitude frontends for Zypper,
for those used to the Debian package manager's CLI structure.

These can be accessed with either of the following:
* /usr/bin/zypp-apt-get
* /usr/bin/zypp-aptitude
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 04 Sep 2017 10:09:03 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: apt/aptitude CLI compatibility interface for Zypper
